entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nelson 06:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
